article.headline: Texas Southern 66, Huston Tillot 62
article.story: HOUSTON (AP) -- Chris Moore scored 22 points and had 11 rebounds to lead Texas Southern to a 66-62 victory over Huston-Tillotson on Wednesday night. Moore hit 9-of-16 from the field and 4-of-5 free throws. Nick Walker added 12 points and Michael Drewy came off the bench to score 12 for Texas Southern (1-3). Titus Butler scored 20 points to lead Huston-Tillotson (0-5). Orlando Wilson added 11. Texas Southern led 41-20 at the half but shot only 29 percent in the second half while Huston-Tillotson whittled away at the lead by shooting 44 percent from the field. K.C. Asomugha hit a 3-pointer with 24 seconds left to cut the margin to 63-60. Texas Southern answered with a free throw by Nick Walker and two free throws by Sollie Norwood for the final score.
